metadata.name: Suspicious File Downloaded From Direct IP Via Certutil.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from direct IPs.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certutil.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('urlcache ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('verifyctl '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://4')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://6')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://9'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://7-')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from direct IPs.
